gov.sandia.rbb.sphinx
Class SoundFormatConverter

java.lang.Object
  gov.sandia.rbb.sphinx.SoundFormatConverter

public class SoundFormatConverter
extends java.lang.Object

This class converts sounds from various formats into the format required for sphinx. This is done using 'sox', so it must be installed and in the PATH to work. This class exists because Java's own AudioSystem format conversion doesn't appear to work at all. isConversionSupported always returns false, even when no conversion is required.

convertStream

public static void convertStream(java.io.InputStream in,
                                 java.io.OutputStream out,
                                 java.lang.String[] fromFormat,

                          throws java.io.IOException,

Read from in until it is empty, writing to out. Does not return until the input is empty, the child process is done and closed. This function assumes it can write to 'out' without it permanently blocking.

Throws:
java.io.IOException
java.lang.InterruptedException
